title: SOUL
author: Olivia Wilson
description: Soul” by Olivia Wilson delves into the essence of human existence. This novel invites readers to explore the depths of the soul, where emotions, experiences, and aspirations converge. Follow the characters on a transformative journey, where the true essence of humanity is laid bare, creating a narrative that resonates with the universal threads that bind us all.

title: HARRY POTTER AND THE CURSED CHILD
author: Jack Throne
description: “Harry Potter and the Cursed Child” is about the journey Albus takes while growing up, and the roles he and his best friend, Scorpius (Draco Malfoy's son), play when dark forces, perhaps in league with Voldemort, once again threaten the fate of the planet.

title: The little Prince
author: Anotnie de Saint
description: The Little Prince by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry is a timeless classic that tells the story of a young prince who travels from planet to planet, learning valuable life lessons along the way

title: The Road
author: Cormac Carthay
description: A father and his son travel on foot to the southern coast, seeking a warmer climate in which to live out their days. A few months before the boy’s birth, an apocalyptic event ended civilization and scorched the entire planetary ecology,

title: City Of Orange
author: David Yoon
description: A man who can not remember his own name wakes up in an apocalyptic landscape, injured and alone. He has vague memories of life before, but he can't see it clearly and can't grasp how his current situation came to be. He must learn to survive by finding sources of water and foraging for food

title: The Godfather
author: Mario Puzo
description: If you know classic book covers, you surely have seen this cover designed by S. Neil Fujita. Fujita’s famous logo design, which portrays a puppeteer orchestrating events, from, behind the curtain resonates with the concluding moments leading up to the last scene. The cover depicts power and control.
